modName: Blue crotch fix for the Zaizai (ALY) follower (by TK and zaizai.)
summary: Removed the references to missing textures. Just merge into the file. Original required.
descriptionHtml:
Blue crotch fix for the Zaizai (ALY) follower.
Removed the references to missing textures. Just merge into the file.

Original required. http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70069/?

Manual install, just overwrite the files when you put it in zaizai's folder.

Manager, change the name to zaizaifollower (or whatever you renamed it to,) then merge.

She blinked in all 8 screenshots, I gave up. Wasn't bothering with ENBs or anything anyway.

Credits:
TK and zaizai - creator.
inses - uploader.
Not sure if they're the same person(s).
Nifscope used for the fix.

I will remove this if the author/uploader asks.
author: Damicireuax
